resources.string: Shared from the Akorn Android app.

Copyright 2014 http://akorn.org.

Developed at the Oxford e-Research Centre.

Incorporates Android Changelog by Karsten Priegnitz (http://code.google.com/p/android-change-log/).
Login email address for your account on the Akorn website; a new account will be created if you don\'t have one.
Password for the above user account.
This setting should only be needed by developers and can usually be left as the default.
Display author names in the main list of articles.
Please configure your username and password using the \"Settings\" menu option
Successfully connected to the Akorn server!
You have no saved searches on the Akorn server.
Your passwords don\'t match - please correct this and try again.
A list of articles will be shown here when a filter for which articles were found is selected from the navigation drawer to the left.
Please close the drawer and then tap the sync icon at the top of the screen and you will be invited to set up an account or log in to an existing account.

Akorn requires an account in order to sync with the server. You may create this by supplying your email address, password and password confirmation below.\n\nIf you\'ve already got an account then please click on \'settings\' below and enter your username and password in the main settings.
An account is needed to use the Akorn app.
Account creation is already in progress!
An account could not be created because:

You may add new search filters or delete existing ones here. Filters may be a journal title or a keyword; start typing in the box below and titles for journals in the Akorn catalogue will autocomplete. Your existing filters (if any) will be shown at the bottom of the screen; touch one to delete it. After updating your filters you should manually re-sync to download new articles.
Would you like to delete this filter?
Please select either keyword or journal title for this filter.
Please type a journal or keyword before submitting.
